home.phrase: I work together with professionals and freelancers to achieve shared goals, consolidating outstanding products in their respective fields and outperforming the competition.

about.title: About Me
about.subTitle: I am Edwin, Frontend Developer
about.p1: Frontend Developer with experience  in creating web applications and Cross-Platform Apps. I specialize in the design, and have experience working with the MERN stack.
about.p2: I also look for new challenges and to continue growing professionally to add value to any work group.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: Contact me if you want us to work together.
